name: Aqua America, Inc.
description: Aqua America, Inc. is a leading water and wastewater utility company that provides essential services to residential and commercial customers across several states in the United States. Founded in 1886, the company has expanded its operations through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, becoming one of the largest publicly traded water utilities in the country. Aqua America is committed to delivering high-quality water and wastewater services while promoting environmental sustainability and conserving natural resources. The company operates in several regions, including Pennsylvania, Ohio, Texas, and North Carolina, serving over three million people. Aqua America invests significantly in infrastructure improvements to ensure reliable service and meet the growing demands for water. In addition to its core utility services, the company is actively involved in community outreach programs and initiatives that promote water conservation and environmental stewardship. Aqua America’s mission is to provide safe, reliable, and affordable water services while contributing to the well-being of the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Aqua America, Inc. | Leading Water Utility Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Aqua America, Inc., a top water utility provider dedicated to delivering safe and reliable water and wastewater services across the United States.

faq.question: What services does Aqua America provide?
faq.answer: Aqua America provides water and wastewater utility services to residential and commercial customers.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Aqua America?
faq.answer: Chris Franklin is the CEO of Aqua America, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Aqua America headquartered?
faq.answer: Aqua America is headquartered in Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania, USA.
